inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: history of severe intellectual disability, CHF, epilepsy presenting with facial twitching on the right and generalized shaking in at his NH which required 20 mg valium to cease seizure activity.

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient first developed seizures at age 13 found by family to have a generalized convulsion.

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: Per outside medical patient was felt to have focal epilepsy with secondary generalization, likely due to anoxic brain injury at birth,

exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: The patient had no further events during the hospital course and was back at his baseline at the time of discharge.

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: Full EEG reports are pending at the time of dictation.

exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: The patient was maintained on Dilantin and phenobarbital.

notes: Patient has a history of severe intellectual disability, CHF, epilepsy. He has been seizure-free for 20 years but recently had a seizure after being tapered off Dilantin.
